item.title: Loose/rocking kerb stone outside 12 Frank Brookes road, 20th March
item.description:
I'm front of the garage of 12 Frank Brookes road the kerb stone is loose

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Frank Brookes Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Drain is blocked/damaged at junction of the Park/Tudor Lodge Road, 20th March
item.description:
Grass verge has been considerably damaged by heavy plant vehicles from road surfacing contractors and National grid vehicles. This has resulted in the drain becoming covered.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tudor Lodge Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road in very poor condition, 20th March
item.description:
With deep scabbing - road falling apart - very difficult to cycle over.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Chancel Way, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole right by the church, 20th March
item.description:
This has been reported for several months. Whoever fixed the pothole just yards down the road must have driven past it; why was this not fixed at the same time?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cockleford Road, Elkstone, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Towards the roundabout for the retail park, 20th March
item.description:
Repeated repair failure. I popped a tyre on this last year and it’s back again along with another one. Be really lovely if you could stop patching it and fix it properly please
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The Cotswold Oak building site entrance is causing a huge amount of us right across the road. This morning four Lorrie’s were entering/exiting the site causing even more mud to be spread across the carriageway. Many local residents are concerned about this ongoing problem. I understood that developers have a responsibility for keeping the access and egress to their site in good order., 20th March
item.description:
The development site Cotswold Oak situated at the corner of Stoke Road and Tredington Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
